name: short link
description: short link example : http://weblogs.about.com/od/twitterfaqs/f/How-Do-I-Make-Short-Urls-On-Twitter.htm to http://weblogs.about.com/od/twitterfaqs/f/How-Do-I... php : $text = http://weblogs.about.com/od/twitterfaqs/f/How-Do-I-Make-Short-Urls-On-Twitter.htm echo preg_replace("/^(.{1,20})(.*|$)/s", "$1...", $text);
